This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the {{BE}} 0.5.0, which assumes at least some familiarity with ''Bedrock Edition'' 0.4.0.

==Mobs==
===New===
{| {{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}}
|-
|[[Zombie pigman]]
|[[File:Zombified Piglin BE1.png|128px]]
|Nether reactors
|{{Drop|Item|Feather|0-1}}
{{Drop|Item|Gold Ingot|0-1}}
|
* Undead, hostile mobs that spawn from nether reactors.
* Missing the top of their head layer.
|}
